name: Tubby
description: When playing a Location Support Card: Spend 2 less Elemental Dice. (Once per Round)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When playing a {SPRITE_PRESET#3104}Location Support Card:</color> Spend 2 less Elemental Dice. (Once per Round)
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When playing a {SPRITE_PRESET#3104}Location Support Card:</color> Spend 2 less Elemental Dice. (Once per Round)
storytext:
"Steeping a pot of tea, watching over the abode, accompanying the Traveler and Paimon to await the arrival of Ping and the others, watching the cloud-filled sky. These days of not having to concern myself with matters of adeptal import truly are ones of leisure..."
"Oh! Oh dear, I must have fallen asleep again. It's a good thing that no one noticed..."
